name: wordget
description: A Wordle clone that works offline and saves daily progress

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir dist && cp src/index.html dist/ && git_sha=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && sed -i '' "s/REPLACE_WITH_GIT_SHA/$git_sha/g" dist/index.html && cp src/style.css dist/ && cp ./sw.js dist/

author: Wordget Developer
